name: Riding Hoverboard Stunts Beach
description:
Riding Hoverboard Stunts Beach is the latest and unique version of hoverboard games. Playing water games have always been a challenging task but when water fun games are combined with hoverboard surfing games then it doubled the challenge and excitement. You would definitely enjoy the unique combo of auto hoverboard and water stunt game. Variety of obstacles are set on the water for performing different water stunts. You have to prove that you are the best water rider by showing different hoverboard surfing stunts. You have to cross a variety of hurdles and wooden obstacles to complete the water missions by using your electric hoverboard.
Features:
- Multiple challenging missions
- Many players for enjoying water fun
- A variety of hurdles
- Amusing sounds
- Realistic beach environment
- High definition graphics
- Real physics-based controls.
